subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ comeback from a two-goal deficit went for naught as Nikita Kucherov scored in overtime to lift the Lightning to a two-games-to-one lead in the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: The Rangers’ comeback from a two-goal deficit went for naught as Nikita Kucherov scored in overtime to lift the Lightning to a two-games-to-one lead in the Eastern Conference finals.
